data.message:
OMG. People here are going crazy on WHO Facebook should be praying for instead.  War happens in countries that are expected and is talked about on the news media DAILY!!!  BUT NO ONE SEEMS TO WATCH IT.  I pray for every single one of those innocent people!!  However, I rarely pray for France, because France is NOT a war zone so to have terrorist attack it, it is surprising to everyone here in America and all other free country. 
So yes, we are praying for France today. Stop trying to make your war bigger than others. No matter what it is, it is the same. Innocent people die!! #PrayForParis

replies.message: Exactly, people should remember this! ❤️
Oh so Lebanon is a war zone ? Kuwait is a war zone ? WAKE UP and smell the double standards!!!!
Amen!!
Are you seriously saying that they aren't war zones?
300 children were executed, slaughtered actually.  War happens?  That's isn't war, it is the most vile of terrorist actions.
How did you apply the filter?
Linda Calvin click on the "try it"
Do you know something of palestine ! Shut up please :)
lo Yaj how did you make your profile like that?
I pity you all for your ignorance.

Love this comment. It is so true. Stop fighting !!! 
And just pray!!
That is right
#prayForWorldPeace * ✌️
I seriously can't stand all the salty replies to this comment. Seems childish...

Zawsze modlimy się o pokój na ziemi dla wszystkich ludzi.Szokujące jest to że media podają że państwo Islamskie przyznało się do zamachów w Paryżu.To są walki polityczne.Tylko dlaczego giną niewinni ludzie.Zwykli ludzie nie są odpowiedzialni za te zamachy.
Love this comment ......pray for everyone
Amém
Renee Falcon, go to Facebook, one of their post will ask if you want to temporary change your profile picture to the flag with your picture in the background by clicking "Try It" button.
Well said 💜
I m with you
up to a point, pray for all
To much is go on god have the last say so we must continue praying for for each other god bless us all
Are you suggesting that we should forget all about the countries which are war zones? And do the world really pray for them, or you're just trying to be the man here! You know nothing, just be quiet.

Bayan Salameh, So sorry if facebook and other people are praying for France after this attack. But you don't live other people's lives to know what people know or what they are feeling. I'm not gonna justify even more to make you understand cause you'll only understand what you want.
I've been waiting for this comment. Thank you.
